mcq.statement: What was Lloyd James Austin III's position in the United States Army before becoming secretary of defence?

options.a: Chief of Staff of the Army
options.b: Vice Chief of Staff of the Army
options.d: Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff

mcq.one_liner: Lloyd James Austin III served as the **33rd vice chief of staff of the army** before becoming secretary of defence.
